reviews.review_msg: I took CRIM 104 online, the lectures and material were very straightforward. Easy A if you put in the effort. I've heard a lot of good things about Barry and he's well respected in the crim community. Would definitely recommend this prof!

I don't know what happened with him between these 2013 and 2015 posts but Dr. Cartwright's lectures were incredibly boring and unhelpful. Course is too hard for a 1st year course and I'm a third year student. When asked to revise a grade based on an error in the system, the TA said she wasn't allowed and Cartwright wouldn't look over it. BADclass!

Worst grade I've received in a University course. Terrible TA who marks way too hard for a first year course. Expect to know even the most obscure of subjects for the tests. Better yet, DO NOT take this course or prof.
Say bye to your GPA, also be prepared to be belittled every time you email him.
